title: Episode 74: Ms. Pat's Trap House and Teaching Center
description:
China is up to funny business by mailing out mysterious packages. Deon shares a video of a wife losing it as her husband's swimming trunks fall off. Ms. Pat shares some pranks from back in the day. It starts at matches and ends with Tom Tom and gun powder. We check in with Ms. Pat's brother. She also shares a story about raising kids that shouldn't be repeated by anyone anywhere ever.

- Get the Crack Baby T-Shirt! https://www.mspatcomedy.com/product/crack-baby-t-shirt/
- Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/patdown
- Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/patdown
- Website: https://www.mspatcomedy.com/
